test.utterance: I can't imagine the fear I'll have in top of the crazy ride.
Oh I love this view, the old look reminds me of the good ol days.
The clouds makes me feel like I'd rather stay home and sleep than going out in his street.
His artistic style is very impressive to come up with the design in his face, it looks beautiful.
Poor cows working so hard while the owner just stands there modeling.
I feel bad for this guy, having to wear such an atrocious sweater.
It's a photo that reminds you how complex and intricate nature can be
The giant clown is profoundly scary and I think I'd run screaming from this place
That's a cute girl, but she looks kind of sad.   Her shirt is all messed up too.
That's such a cute puppy, I just want to give him a hug.  Also i like the iron railing.
That bird looks like it wants to kill me.  It's frightening.
This photo makes me want to hang out with that elephant and make friends with it.
The olympics leave a bad taste in my mouth anymore, because of all the political nonsense, so anytime I see that logo I get a little disgusted
That man has such terrible posture that it makes me almost feel queasy.
That man looks like he's about to be hit by some object
That looks so decadent, all those fancy boats and whatnot.  It's too much.
Things like this always make me think I'll break my leg in some kind of accident
angry faces in a sketchbook, they look very angry and make me feel upset
a very peaceful beach scene with rocks and fog, makes me feel calm
a young man on a bike on a jump. he looks like he's having a lot of fun
a young girl in a hollister shirt, i remember wearing those in highschool and it made me laugh thinking about how popular they were
a zebra in a farm, he looks young and cute i'd love to see him play
An imposing building, it looks like  a prison or jail. I feel watched over in a bad way
two men in suits shaking hands, i'm not familiar with who they are but it looks political which makes me uneasy or untrusting
two men on a picnic bench, it's in black and white which always gives an image a somber tone
Jagged rocks rise up from this coast, and pebbles make a rough carpet down to the water, making this beach look inhospitable, empty, forsaken.
This rollercoaster loops all over, high above the ground, the picture makes me feel the adrenaline and the rush of wind as the car whizzes along the track.
The olympic torch is passed along as people watch from the sidelines. What a unique and special moment!
A man skateboards through the street, I can practically feel the rush of speed and the thrum of adrenaline.
This little motorcycle looks like fun! The rider leans as if taking a curve at full speed, I bet it's a real thrill!
This kid is having so much fun on his skateboard! This reminds me of fun summer days, and I can practically feel the rush of adrenaline!

This woman looks like a tourist, camera raised, ready to capture some new scene even in the pouring rain! Her backpack and full shopping bags put me in mind of a chaotic trip, needing to capture the sights and get all the souvenirs no matter the weather.

This looks like some kind of memorial, though it is not clear what it is for. The dark shapes coming out of the metal relief look like soldiers, the dark imagery contrasting sharply with the bright day and only serving to enhance the melancholy feel.
This is a casual snapshot of people walking on a street, some admiring the view, nothing too exciting happening. It exudes a feel of normalcy and contentment.
Lips in a raised sneer indicate that something unpleasant to about to come out of this woman's mouth and I don't want to be within shouting distance!
A landscape tinged with fog patches and a beautiful sky makes me want to be there!
That ugly creature reminds me of the oddities we encountered at a roadside stop in Texas!
This black and white picture of this rinky dink roller coaster remind me of being petrified of getting on Coney Island rides as a child.
The entrance to this building with the enormous clown facade is hilarious.
Reminds me of how easily an uncontrolled fire can begin.
The wooden rollercoaster looks so much fun and thrilling to ride.

It has been years since I have attended a sporting event live.  Looking at this picture of a full stadium watching a soccer game makes me remember that soccer games that I have attended.  I love watching live sports.
I think this is a nice active shot of a roulette wheel as it is spinning.  The little trail on the white ball looks neat.
The zombie makeup that the two men used in the picture looks very well-done.
The white, snowy background of the ski slope looks very pure to me.  I used to snowboard all the time and the feeling of being on a ski slope was amazing to me.
I love pictures of city streets at night.  The city lights look great when the sun has gone down.
I have always been fascinated with motorcycles.  The motorcycles in the pictures look shiny and well-built.
The golden glow in the picture really looks magical.  Pictures at dusk/dawn look great to me because of the lighting.
I dislike the Big Brother shirt that the man in the yellow costume has on.  I do not like the Big Brother show at all.
The look on her face looks like she's lost something. She's clearly waiting on someone or something.
I'm not sure what kind of cars these are but I'd like to watch a race like that.
This makes me laugh because kids are always putting random things in their mouths.
This looks like a mother elephant who is helping her baby and that makes me happy.
The way in which her red finger nails are the only non black or white color in the photograph really makes them stand out.
The newborn baby has a hand that is severely damaged, which pulls at my heart strings.
Seeing the three men walking with the elephant makes me feel sad, as I feel like an elephant should be amongst their own kind for their own happiness.
The blue color of the person there due to the filter used and the witch-like hat makes me think the person is dressing up for Halloween.
While some people don't like the luggage aspect of traveling, it gives me a sense of peace because I travel for pleasure.
The sandwich that she seems to be eating has a lot of onions on it, which I am not a fan of.
Pizza is perhaps my favorite food to eat, so seeing the older man chopping fresh toppings on it behind the counter makes me feel elated.
I go to the beach once a week with my children, so seeing the kids on the shore makes me elated.
This looks daring for its time and that's a huge achievement!
This looks like it has a lot of history behind it! I love it
This picture looks nostalgic and makes me think about my childhood
This person looks like he is dying or something
this person looks like he needs a rest, the Pidgeon on his left just makes this picture funny
this picture makes it seems like this place was abandoned
Good quality photo of one of my favorite animals
I feel peace and contentment when I can see a view from up high in the air.
I feel fear when I see a person coming towards me with something in their hand that could be used as a weapon.
I do not like spiders I'm scared of them and they make me cringe.
This is a false idol that people worship I believe and I don't think that is good.
I do not like idols that represent false idols to worship.
I feel this way because the words that are written in the picture are funny cause of the way they use the word fuck so many times
This man is flying a beautiful kite and I love to see people flying kites it makes me feel excited
This Livingroom is so nice and clean and cozy. I love cleanliness.
I feel this way because the people in the picture looks like they are having fun kayaking in the beautiful weather
Seeing the people walk in a parade on a hot summer day makes me feel this way because I love parades and the exciting energy it brings
I feel this way because this person looks like they are enjoying their book cause they are standing up reading it which means it is a very good book.
Looks like a cold day to fly a kite, I would rather be inside.
I do not think dogs belong in the house and do not like this picture.
I do not believe animals belong inside of the house not even cats.
Not so sure of the task in this picture but it looks like it takes a lot of skill.
This cake looks pretty good but doesn’t look like it would taste good.
This cave looks extremely creepy to me.  I would not want to go around that corner!
This guy looks like the devil - I would be afraid to go near him.
The baby is so cute with his big blue eyes and his curly hair.
If I saw this bear and her cubs on the trail, I would run away as fast as I could.
One of these boys are going to trip and fall flat on their face.
He certainly didn't park his car in the right parking space today!!
That bear looks to be very hungry, angry and mean.
He looks like he’s been making pizzas all of his life and he can probably make them in his sleep.
This poor kid looks lost; I hope he can find his parents soon.
That looks like the most scariest stunt I've ever seen.
This shows a kid in a spotlight I am amused because he is wearing a funny sweater, and hat.
This shows the face of some sort of reptile up close. His eye looks cool, but I really don't like reptiles, because of their scales.
Looking at this makes me think about the scary haunted castle I went to last year with my husband.
Looking at that cat reminds me of my cat that was extra angry to everyone but me.
Looking at this woman makes me feel like this is a scary woman and might kill someone.
This couple is just living everyday life as they look through the fridge to figure out what to cook.
This makes me scared someone is gonna get hurt and break their neck.
I imagine I am at a huge fair having a lot of fun getting ready to ride this Farris wheel.
These people look very scared as if they are locked in a room and can’t get out. They look like they are screaming for help.
Lots of people gathering and being entertained at what looks like a big event under a tent.
Looks pretty but I bet it doesn’t taste very good. Too much icing and dry chocolate cake.
I don’t know why this Farris wheel s just abandoned out in the middle of a field but it looks sad.
Reminds me of the stained glass windows at church which gives me a sense of peace and contentment.
Looks like they are having a good amusing chat before the competition begins.
A photo of a collapsed roller-coaster rail with riders still aboard frightens me for their safety.
I am not sure what the artist is trying to express about the woman that he painted but it is thought provoking and as such always breeds contentment for me.
A black and white photo of a man sitting in a room with scribbling of love and hate over his head frightens me.
An old muscle car on a drift track is exciting because of the precision and danger the driver faces.
The grimy conditions of the cook area, the pan, etc. makes the imagination wonder to what would also be in the egg if that were really the conditions that it is going to be prepared in.
This person seems like they shouldn't be in this service tunnel.  A sign of poverty and instability?
What is the professor going to teach?  He seems prepared and ready to go.
looks like a ride at an amusement park. those are fun and exhilarating.
looks like a feris wheel those are thrilling and exciting.
Ride looks fast and dangerous. Could get hurt.
Looks like Disney work. Looks entertaining and fun to watch.
Snakes are scary. They are dangerous and can be poisonous.
A lot of riots have been ending in injury, arrest and/or death. riots can be dangerous.
looks dangers but entertaining. takes a lot of skill and talent.
Kittens are so cute, I feel a lot of awe when I see them. I wish I had one as a pet.
That meal looks great, I wish I was eating a great meal right now.
It is always cool and breathtaking to see a bear in the wild. I kinda want to get close to them right now.
The  car is beautiful and it looks like a fun day out watching cars.
The womans eyes look concerning like is planning to do something evil.
Looks like someone important was buried there and it makes me curious about the life they led.
This old fair ride looks unsafe and worn down.
This picture makes me feel like everytime I play a game and I am losing and get frustrated.
The colors and the fading of this picture it looks really lonly and sad.
The way she is looking to the side it seems like she maybe lonley or longing for something she doesn't have.
This reminds me of when we do sparklers on fourth of july and it is a lot of fun.
The doc in this picture does not look sturdy at all and it might fall any second.
This skateboarder jumping up in the air makes me feel free.
The framing of the picture, and the black water against white sky is mesmerizing
The photo is blurry due to movement and poor exposure, so everything looks ugly
It's spelling out an insult with Scrabble letters, so it's clever
The glint of the gold coins in this light, plus the bokeh effect, makes me feel like im an arcade
The red light painting her face in front of a purple blue sky is so pretty
The text suggests it's just an obnoxious advertisement
The really old piece of technology looks uncomfortable to use.
The expression made by the girl is arousing and sexual.
Interesting and kind of ominous Buddha statues look strange.
The expression on the main man's face looks extremely displeased.
The torch relay is a great tradition and usually marks the beginning of an interesting spectacle.
Bikes always make me nervous that there will be a bad accident.
An impatient driver blocking a hydrant does little to win sympathy from the rest of those in a hurry.
It is a lonely walk on a tight city street where the trials of life continue.
The street sign doesn't tell a person much when they are lost in a strange area.
Seeing this dog sleep on a single blanket next to a newspaper makes him or her look lonely!
For some reason, the look in these zebra's eyes convey tremendous emotion, as if they are unhappy.
Seeing this dog stuck on the balcony is quite saddening, as if his or her's owner decided to leave the house and leave the dog there.
Seeing this person eat two donuts in half and put them back makes me angry as it's such a waste of food!
What is the point of flying a kite if you just have it strapped to your back? This takes out all the fun and angers me.
Seeing these dogs alone in what looks like a formidable environment doesn't sit well with me.
Seeing these people covered in dirt climbing a dirty pole is slightly revolting.
Seeing a little kid mop a floor fill me with anger, a child should not be doing a job.
The way this kid is jumping off the swing looks like he is about to get seriously injured!
Coins are always dirty and that game is a rip off.
I'm not sure what the girl is sad about but she looks like she could use a hug.
I don't like hockey its too loud and violent.
The colors and the obvious laughing demeanor of the Buddha makes you want to laugh along with him.
Nylons, like the ones being worn by this woman in the blue skirt are uncomfortable as are those shinny dress shoes.
The cold path in a wooded area feels quiet, and looks like a good place to think.
So many boats out on the ocean, polluting and clogging the water ways for the people not in boats and all the animals.
These two geese look like they would like if someone were to drop a grape or two for them, while on the grass.
I am in awe of these three golden Buddhas because I know that a lot of people have such strong beliefs in them.
The baby looks so peaceful makes me feel at ease and in aww of how cute the baby is
The girl seems to be walking through a dark and scary place which looks like it could make the hairs in the back of my neck stand up.
The snake looks like a ride i rode as a kid good memories
The lady leaning against the tree looks like she would make me feel like I can talk to her about anything.
The slab of stone looks like a tombstone that looks cold to the touch and sends chills my my spine.
This busy street makes me want to be there and enjoy the sites with no worries.
Riding on a raft through the amazon -- I can almost feel the humidity on my face.
Makes me feel excited to see this image. I wonder if rides from the past look like the ones we ride today
When I look at this drab living room with it's dull earth-tone colored furniture, I can't help but feel fear because something horrible has happened here.
People in vaudeville outfits dance in front of a trolley. I am sad because this just makes me think of how bad things were during the great depression.
A frowny face drawn onto the condensation on a window in front of a candle. This is actually funny to me, because it looks more like an ironic attempt to express sadness than a sincere one.

A picture of a free palestine movement. I am content because I really don't care about middle eastern countries. They hate each other for stupid reasons and will keep hating each other no matter what happens.
I feel a little disgusted because it looks like the person in font is sticking his hand down his pants.
I am afraid that some flying insect will come into her home if she keeps the door open like that.
Given the uninspired facial expression of this frog mascot I am amused to know that someone was paid to design and build it
The person looks very pensive and maybe even angry, or simply ruminating.
Wasp nests gross me out, even if they are dormant. I can picture the wasps crawling in and out.
Geese scare me, as they hiss and chase after people.
This goat's head looks so huge compared to the rest.
I am amused because the cat looks unamused.
The train station is unfamiliar but is used in everyday life.
People playing ball out in a cornfield doesn't look so bad when it is so nice out.
adorable dog guarding the yard-i get a lift in happiness just looking at him
the moment you realize you put on too much damn eye liner
stillness and quiet--the day the earth stood still
these are stained glasss windows reminds me of the church I grew up in-not pleasant because it was basically i had to do.
this is a small boat that looks like it is over capacity with people. i look at this with dread  and caution.
Zebras have the muscular grace of horses combined with the fascinating design of their coats.
Owlets are some of the cutest things in the world.
Those shadowy dreadlocks look like they were hand-woven by glorious, shadowy angels.
This photo makes me feel sad because the person has an unhappy expression.
This photo makes me feel contentment because the guys with their arms casually around each other makes me feel like they are having a good bromance.
The fair is small, but it looks like a lot of fun.
The dog looks sad and lonely.  That makes me sad.
The helicopter is big.  It must take a lot of skill to fly it.
The room looks really messy. There is toilet paper there. It's gross looking.
The idea of riding a motorcycle is scary.
It's a peaceful beach scene. Makes me think of going on vacation.
It looks like a place to travel and I love to travel.
It looks like a weird stock photo. I do not like the lighting.
I feel so calm seeing the urban area covered in snow and no traffic on the roads.
The abundance of fruit falling from the plant is a nice sight and implies that it grows in a place of abundance.
Gentle water waves and playing at the beach is always a relaxing sight.
These two women are smiling, carrying purses and walking in a crowded place which makes me think they're shopping and that is always fun to do.
While the spinning object looks fun, it kind of makes me sick to look at.
The motorcycle is displayed in a way that makes me feel like I'm at a lively, relaxing event.
The beach looks empty except for one family, and the colors of the image also look washed out.
I am worried about one of the horse riders falling off their horse because it reminds me of hearing stories about the same thing happening to other riders.
The tiny dog is playing with its toy and has a very cute, small face, almost like a pug.
The long road makes me think of long road trips in the middle of nowhere, where there are no cars like this picture.
The lizard's squinted eyes make it look like it is judging the photographer, almost like a human.
I don't know what could be under the water because I cannot see under it.
I don't understand what the sign means by "inward" in regards to the cars, which is frustrating.
I would be very happy if my significant other kissed me on the cheek.
I really don't think that horses should be ridden by humans. It's cruel.
I love babies and this makes me reminisce of my own.
I have a friend that works for the fire department and this reminds me of him.
I was never good at skateboarding and wish I could do this type of trick.
I can't tell what type of animal that is but it looks big to be in a tree and therefore scary.
I'd have no problem driving on this road and being in this town although the weather looks rough.
A happy dog chewing on a bone is so fun and makes me happy and relaxed just to see it!
A woman looking upset with rain in the background and it just makes me feel sad thinking maybe she lost a beautiful day out to the bad weather.
That is a terrifying photo of the cat and I don't know what's wrong with it but it's genuinely scary
It feels calming and joyful to see her sitting there in deep in thought.
The look on her face says it all. She's like why is dad so weird.
I feel like each one of these stuffed animals are staring at me its very creepy.
The entire family looks committed as the little kids kite soars through the sky.
My dog does the same thing i hate when they destroy their toys.
The Meat and biscuit look amazing the broccoli not so much. I am now hungry!
People are competing against each other, so intense, respect.
The guides always tell you to avoid taking the starfish out of the water. This guy is being irresponsible.
A man attending his business and working hard
It's a beautiful statue it makes me appreciate the beautiful things in life
I feel contentment because I see an old man walking on the streets innocently holding an umbrella that seems to be broken and that's adorable
I feel contentment because I see a very clean bathroom and that means that's really healthy
I feel contentment because this Public Market Center sign reminds me of when I was a kid and used to go with my parents to the market and do our shopping, makes me nostalgic and happy
The picture shows the inside of a church, and that makes me feel sadness because it makes me feel like I'm about to witness a funeral
Wondering on this strange five headed being, whether its real or fake.
I could see many red lights, that reminds me of something danger, nothing other than this.
Perfect and clear cut family photo of the Giraffe, I liked it.
Seeing the telephone booths at first i thought they were port-a-potties (outhouses) i was grossed out at first then i saw the spray paint and it grossed me out again.
Wow amazing I've never seen anything like it in my life!
Because it gives me enthusiasm boats are exhilarating.
I am angry if I have to sit at the stop lights like that for a long time some of them are so ridiculous they just make your skin crawl.

The thrill of riding a motorcycle is exhilarating the wind blowing in my hair one of my favorite times of year to ride is in fall I know everybody else is summer usually anyways but mines fall because even though it's chilly and even colder on the motorcycle the smell of the firewood coming from peoples homes when I'm riding it's one of my favorite smells in the world at that time of year might sound weird lol but I love it.
The bathroom looks so confined in such a small space it would make me nervous being in there for more than a few minutes feeling confined to one space
It brings me a sense of wonderment amazement looking at the skyline over top of the huge city and overlooking the water I would feel like I am bigger than the entire city.
I would feel amazed and in a sense of wonder looking at how huge these Longhorns are they are like an animal in a dream they are so big.
The vastness of the mountains and landscape puts me into a sense of wonderment of the beauty.
It reminds me of a window shopping area with the brick streets and the businesses. I always am excited to shop when I can, even window shopping.
Afraid and worried because the two men look mad at each other and they are going to start arguing.
I would be terrified walking on stilts like that.
I don’t like seeing animals caged up, no matter how big the cage is.
The photo of a large green plant in the water makes me feel content because it is a peaceful nature scene.
The stuffed toy bears in the window make me feel contentment because they are cute toys wearing clothes.
The large brown bear in a fenced enclosure makes me feel awe because it is a close-up, detailed view of a large predator.
The black and white photo of an elderly man holding an umbrella that is inside out makes me feel fear because I wonder how strong the winds are blowing.
The view of a clear sidewalk flanked by a wall and car-lined, tree-lined street with mountains in the background makes me feel content because this is a scenic place to visit.
The view of a small white bathroom makes me feel a little fear because the bathtub has no curtains around it and there is no towel on the floor.
The sign on the gray pole by the side of a road in Germany makes me feel amused because it shows that someone named Tina is 1 kilometer from the sign and I wonder why she is so important.
The bedroom with white blankets, a mirror, and bathroom makes me feel content because it looks like a relaxing and comfortable place to stay.
The view of the tabby cat walking on the sidewalk by the street makes me feel content because it is a cute animal.
The man looks too big to ride the bike and could crash.
The naked body is something that is to be kept hidden.
The grin on her face and the dark eyes are a bit scary.
Get off your phone and enjoy God's creation right in front of you!
I cannot believe they have toothpaste for animals!
The dark street looks eerie and unsafe with the dim lights.
This is a beautiful motor bike, the color is awesome!
I do not like the highways and I do not like the tall walk way down the highway.
The old factory and boat look quiet and historic.
The busy street makes me nervous because of all the people and its narrow way.
The clouds look eerie and dark, the tall buildings make it look weird.
The big dark cloud looks to be bringing in a bad storm.
Elephants are such a beautiful and majestic animal.
The close up shot of the head and the almost devil like eyes strikes fear into me.
The man looks like a very powerful and important man.
The lines of cars and their light gives the photo an amazing look.
The beautiful clothing on the person and the beautiful animals is something to be amazed about.
The water look so clean and also the city with their trees and buildings.
The man standing on the front looks so sad as he looks to people enjoying life.
It reminds of the destruction that human beings do to their body.
This makes me feel excited because dog is having fun with his owner (most likely) playing and running around.
This makes me feel fear because it is not very clear but there is indiction of studying and university but image looks gloomy as if it gives negative news, rejection and/or fail.
This makes me feel content because this couple looks peaceful and cool enjoying their time in the park.
For some reason this picture makes me feel sad because boy looks sad and I am worried that he is chewing on an object that he should not be - where are the parents?
I feel sad looking at this image because cat looks nice but it is existing in a bad room with cracked floors and pipes open, paint peeling.
This image gives me feelings of excitement because this elephant family look so adorable and loving together, also, I love elephants so much.
This image gives me feelings of excitement seeing horses in the river getting cooled down, beautiful nature and day.
When you are this happy, nothing will rain on your parade
I’m looking more at the shop than I am at the girl I love how the shop owner has decorated the window and I appreciate the mosaic detail on the storefront
I am curious about this event at first glance this seems like a fun costume. However you later notice his jacket is full of syringes. What is going on here??
I am worried for this man’s safety as he skateboards quickly through a parking lot with moving cars in it.
I suspect this man is about to deliver a fine evening of entertainment
All day, every day, common citizens work together to ensure our society operates.
Those two older women are awed by this man’s athleticism and bravery!
I feel she is checking one last email before she leaves for work
The white dog refuses to acknowledge his fake antlers are anything but normal and dignified.
They appear very regal when they are lining up like that.
The beach with the water lapping in always relaxes me.
He has taken over the chair and he even has the remotes ready. Hilarious.
It is sad that it turned out the way that it did. The concept was good and it could have been amazing.
He looks so sad and very tired. He can't even get up the energy to play with the ball.
They seem to be having a nice relaxing conversation and enjoying each other.
I'm always struck speechless when I see a beautiful old building.
By the look of his face he seems to be very agitated and angry.
They look very happy to have made it to the top.
That is a beautiful old building that has been well taken care of.
When an airplane is smoking like that it is usually getting ready to crash.
She looks contemplative as she perches on her rock.
Makes you feel like you are right there in the midst of the rodeo excitement.
The couple have sad disapproving faces as they look at something out of view.  I makes me feel sorry for them and sad.
Interesting book titles surrounding an interesting document on a laptop's display are exciting prospects.
These images of attractive women from a generation ago do not hint at the bigoted and unfair society the accompanying text reveals.
A bight kite that someone is going to fly soon is a fun activity.
I am certain those two children should not be so close to what appears to be a large snake.
The elephant looks lonely and fenced in by an electric fence.  They deserve better.
I’m getting serious uncanny valley from this photo and I am unable to tell if this is animated or not. It’s a very odd picture
This dog is rather cute and makes me feel warm
This kid looks very tired I wish she could get some rest
I love being out on the ocean on my boat in this photo reminds me of those content moments.
This reminds me of the old days when I would get Philly Cheese-Steaks with my grandpa.
I used to play tennis with my dad before he died. Seeing this reminds me of that.
This area seems to be very engaging and beautiful.
The excessive number of signs is quite funny.
This waterfront area looks so well designed and is inspiring
The perspective of being on train tracks seems so scary.
This cat looking so confused seems funny.
This goat looks very funny and is humorous to watch.
The thought of getting on a motorcycle again scares me after going through an accident with them.
The cigar-smoking man in the Harley Davidson tee and his equally-adorned friend look like they smell like the inside of a tobacco shop.
The on-the-go nature of this photograph of a Tokyo schoolgirl reminds me of weird 'creepshots'
The garish texture of the patterned bedspread, in addition to the hideous heart stickers plastered on the wall, makes me sick to my stomach
The statue of a cartoon frog holding an orange umbrella has a grotesque look on its face
I tend to shy away from areas populated by men in black tanktops in skateboard parks
An omelet still frying in the pan reminds me of a heaving mass of revolting molten marshmallow
The old man with the umbrella seems to be beckoning me to sit close to him on the bench, yuck!
The room is too colorful because of the wall design as it's full of red hearts, which is the symbol of love.
The omelet in a fry pan is so yummy and tasty to look as it's cooked in a right way and not fried much.
A man is surfing in the river and some other men are ready with their surfing boat to surf in the river waiting eagerly.
The cow tied with a rope and it's forced and pulled by the person to do the work he orders. The cow's face looks so upset and not interested.
A guy is posing for a photo wearing a black shirt and he has grey eyes and a small teddy bear is lying on his bed.
A bike is parked at the side if the road, which is so stylish and the owner takes good care of it.
Two Yamaha bikes are parked in front of the house which has been cleaned properly and has taken good care of it.
Many sheep are gazing in the fields and a sheep is looking in close up, as it is so innocent to look at and it isn't harmful by any means.
It is raining but he's still painting. It's a great symbol of hard work. His umbrella is broken which makes the whole scene sad.
The sky is gloomy and the vehicles are old. It's either an old picture from the 2000s or a picture from a bad neighborhood. Either way, it makes me feel sad.
Sadness is the closest feeling to what I feel. It reminds me of the powerful bond between a mother and her offspring.
Somehow, the green cones bother and anger me. I'm used to seeing orange cones. Besides, the picture is blurry and this annoys me as well.
I am pretty sure there are bugs in those plants. When people take pictures of gardens that close, it usually looks disgusting.
